headline: Why I Bought More of This Top Warren Buffett Dividend Stock During the Recent Stock Market Sell-Off
summary: The stock market has sold off hard this year.  The silver lining to stock market sell-offs is that they enable investors to buy high-quality dividend stocks while they're on sale.  One that I added to during the sell-off was Chevron (NYSE: CVX).

headline: VDE: Energy On The Brink, Why $50 Oil Is Key
summary: Vanguard Energy Index Fund ETF Shares (VDE) sees volatility, dropping to $108. With an attractive 14.4x P/E ratio & 3.7% yield, it remains a buy. See more here.
